title: That Stupid Runt Who Reunited with Me After 10 Years Is Now Transformed into a Beautiful and Innocent High School Girl - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Popular Love Interests   Younger Love Interests
author: 館西夕木
description:
Arizuki, who quit his job in Tokyo, decided to look for a job in his hometown of Shizuoka. He bumped into a high-school girl when he was about to re-start his life.

That very girl, was the girl who lived with him next door. That very girl with whom he used to play a lot, but Arizuki was yet to notice that at all. All because of her transformation …>
